content:
Anyone able to comment on whether we need to use Backdrop's wrapper functions over PHP's core functions, or can we just use PHP's for performance reasons? See info here: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/2655#issuecomment-571107350

Fix ordering issues in admin menu 路 Issue #2655 路 backdrop/backdrop-issues
Status update (6th Jan) The PR is passing all tests and seems to be working nicely. Previous iterations of the PR have been marked as 'works for me' by a few users, though maybe a full revi...
I think we just didn't want a regression which seems like you've achieved. Making it even faster is a bonus
